title: Book Your Session
subtitle: Choose between in-person or online session
session_format_subtitle: Choose the format that best suits you
group_session_desc: Join a session with other participants
individual_session_desc: Exclusive and personalized session for you
presencial_desc: Personal meeting at one of our locations
select_location_desc: Select the most convenient location for you
no_slots_available: No time slots available for this date
booking_success: Your session has been successfully booked!
confirmation_email: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
online_session_info: Your online session will be held via Google Meet or Zoom.
online_session_link_info: The link will be sent to your email after confirmation.
error_loading_locations: Error loading locations. Please try again.
error_loading_slots: Error loading available slots. Please try again.
error_creating_booking: Error creating booking. Please try again.
confirmation_sent_to: Your session has been successfully scheduled. We sent a confirmation email to
link_sent_before: The link will be sent by email 30 minutes before the session
qr_code_desc: Present this code at reception on the day of your session
arrive_early: Arrive 10 minutes early for in-person sessions
test_connection: For online sessions, test your connection and camera in advance
reminder_email: You will receive a reminder email 24 hours before the session
reschedule_cancel: To reschedule or cancel, contact us at least 24 hours in advance
need_help: Need help or have any questions?
mock_payment_description: Stripe integration is not configured with real keys. Use the data below to simulate a payment.
